name: Required Title Section
validation: Document must contain a clear title

name: Document ID Format
validation: Document ID must follow SOP-### format

name: Effective Date
validation: Effective date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

name: Purpose Section
validation: Document must contain a purpose section

name: Scope Section
validation: Document must contain a scope section

name: Definitions Section
validation: Document should contain definitions for technical terms

name: Procedure Section
validation: Procedure section must contain at least 3 numbered steps

name: Revision History
validation: Must contain at least one revision history entry

name: Approval Signatures
validation: Must contain Prepared by, Reviewed by, and Approved by signatures

name: No Placeholder Text
validation: Document must not contain TBD, lorem ipsum, or similar placeholders

name: Proper Reference Format
validation: References should follow standard citation format with years
